meanings: make the most of an opportunity

vlive.korean: 그냥 주어진 상황에 잘 일을 헤쳐나가는 게 - 아니 아까는... Just go through the challenges you face. - I mean... 듣기 View video BTS : 오늘은 내가 진짜 김밥 요리사
vlive.english: Just go through the challenges you face. - I mean...

vlive.korean: [주어진 제시어에 멤버 5명 모두 똑같은 동작을 취하면 성공!] [All members should make the same pose at the given word!] View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.8
vlive.english: [All members should make the same pose at the given word!]

vlive.korean: 뭐든 주어진거에 되게 열심히 해요 저희 멤버들 모두 다! In everything we're given, we really work hard. All the members. 듣기 View video ITZY : 🖤
vlive.english: In everything we're given, we really work hard. All the members.

vlive.korean: [요리 완성까지 주어진 시간은 30분!] [They have 30 minutes to cook!] View video 컨버전스티비 (CONS TV) : [커먼스쿨]서울관광고등학교 ep7(홍현희X정세운X강율)
맞아요 - 우리한테 주어진 시간이 많지 않으니까 - 뭘 쓴 거야? Right. - We don't have much time. - What are you wearing? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] 아스트로 X 우리의 밤 (Our Night with ASTRO)
vlive.english: Right. - We don't have much time. - What are you wearing?

examples.korean: He criticized the huge pay rises awarded to industry bosses. 발음듣기 그는 업계 사장들에게 주어진 막대한 급여 인상을 비판했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He criticized the huge pay rises awarded to industry bosses. 발음

examples.korean: You’ve overrun your time by 10 minutes. 발음듣기 당신은 주어진 시간을 10분 초과했어요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You’ve overrun your time by 10 minutes. 발음

examples.korean: Please answer questions in the space provided. 발음듣기 주어진 공간에 질문에 대한 답을 쓰시오. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Please answer questions in the space provided. 발음

examples.korean: Her first defeat was an early lesson in humility. 발음듣기 그녀의 첫 패배는 일찍이 주어진 겸손에 관한 교훈이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Her first defeat was an early lesson in humility. 발음

examples.korean: Read the text carefully and then answer the questions. 발음듣기 주어진 지문을 잘 읽고 질문들에 답하시오. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Read the text carefully and then answer the questions. 발음
